import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Shop_2 from "./shop_2" import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; export default function Shop_1() { const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState("nothing"); var [test, setTest] = useState(false) var [products, setProducts] = useState([]) var [register, handleSubmit] = useForm() const navigate = useNavigate(); var onSearch = (event) => { var keyword = event.target.keyword.value navigate(`/search/${keyword}`,{replace: true}); } useEffect(function() { if (!test) { fetchData() } }, [test]) var fetchData = async function () { var res = await fetch('http://localhost:3001/Fruits') var data = await res.json() setProducts(prevFruit => [...prevFruit, ...data]) setTest(true) } function onOrder() { } return ( <>
